com.zendesk.sdk.attachment

Interface ImageUploadHelper.ImageUploadProgressListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ImageUploadHelper

    public static interface ImageUploadHelper.ImageUploadProgressListener
    ImageUploadHelper will allow to set a listener that will be notified when something interesting happens to an image.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allImagesUploaded(Map<File,UploadResponse> responses)
      Called when all images added through ImageUploadHelper.uploadImage(java.io.File) are uploaded
      void imageUploaded(UploadResponse uploadResponse, File file)
      Called after an image was uploaded
      void imageUploadError(ErrorResponse errorResponse, File file)
      Called after an image failed to upload

    • Method Detail

      • allImagesUploaded

        void allImagesUploaded(Map<File,UploadResponse> responses)
        Called when all images added through ImageUploadHelper.uploadImage(java.io.File) are uploaded
        Parameters:
        responses - A map of all successfully uploaded images

      • imageUploaded

        void imageUploaded(UploadResponse uploadResponse,
                 File file)
        Called after an image was uploaded
        Parameters:
        uploadResponse - Server response
        file - A reference to the local file on external storage

      • imageUploadError

        void imageUploadError(ErrorResponse errorResponse,
                    File file)
        Called after an image failed to upload
        Parameters:
        errorResponse - Object containing the reason why the upload failed
        file - A reference to the local file on external storage
